participant_1.name: Jack Thompson
participant_1.personality: Jack is generous and caring, always willing to lend a hand. He has a great sense of humor and enjoys sharing stories from his past.
participant_1.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Emily is determined and hardworking, juggling her college studies with her job. She is outgoing and enjoys meeting new people, despite her dislike for certain foods.
participant_2.background: i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i do not like chicken. i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i'm in college to become a nurse.
